name: CreepyDuel
0:
”Alexa, open creepy duel halloween”
”Alexa, start creepy duel halloween”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: creepy duel halloween
des: Creepy Duel is a collectible card game to tremble with fear with your friends, it has several game modes, it includes spooky special and resource cards. It is based on the concept of dueling cards and is mostly inspired by the horror genre, Halloween, Halloween, etc. Summon a creature with the help of your assistant to attack your enemies. At any time, you can say "stop" to exit the skill. Play on Halloween by saying "Creepy Duel", summon one of the creatures to attack your enemy each turn.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
